title: Ex-JPMorgan Traders Convicted in Federal Fraud Trial; Justice Department had alleged precious-metals traders spoofed gold futures for years
text:
After deliberating for more than eight days, the jury convicted Gregg Smith and Michael Nowak of charges including spoofing and wire fraud. A sales executive who worked with them, Jeffrey Ruffo, was acquitted.

This developing story will be updated.

Write to Dave Michaels at dave.michaels@wsj.com

Ex-JPMorgan Traders Convicted in Federal Fraud Trial
